metadata.title: CVE-2024-25584 on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description: Dovecot accepts dot LF DOT LF symbol as end of DATA command. RFC requiresthat it should always be CR LF DOT CR LF. This causes Dovecot to convertsingle mail with LF DOT LF in middle, into two emails when relaying toSMTP. Dovecot will split mail with LF DOT LF into two mails. Upgrade tolatest released version. No publicly available exploits are known.

criterions.comment: dovecot package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
